entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bug at DataTable.Load(dataReader) when result have NULL value on joined column #29744
  • Ef Core causes 'Access violation' when deleting Data that is tracked by ef core with ExecuteDeleteAsync #29743
  • EFCore 7.0.0 - Graph of entity insertion throws a FK exception #29741
  • DbContext.ChangeTracker.Entries() throws StackOverflowException #29740
  • NullReference Exception when Add-Migration when I try to use Json Column in EF7 #29738
  • Erroneous circular dependency detection when updating entities with composite primary key and one-to-one relationships #29737
  • Expression query not computed anymore from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET Core 6 #29736
  • Does Json Column support a collection value? #29735
  • Query/JSON: consider improvements to SQL we generate when we access element in collection mapped to JSON #29734
    Backlog
  • QueryTrackingBehavior resets to TrackAll when using DbContext pooling #29733
  • Query/JSON: improve exceptions when failing to translate JSON queries #29732

Closed

  • [7.0, SQL Server]: No option to override auto-generated Index filter for nullable columns #29739

PullRequests

Updated

  • Sequence cache support #29716
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656
  • Thanksgiving project: lookup entities by primary key, alternate key, or foreign key #29686
